title: 求助，hmcl启动器崩溃问题
author: 临表涕零
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-8-16 19:12 编辑 

客户端：1.16.2-fabric端
以下是崩溃报告：
Command: "C:\\Program Files\\AdoptOpenJDK\\jdk-8.0.262.10-openj9\\jre\\bin\\javaw.exe" -Dminecraft.client.jar=.minecraft\versions\1.16.2\1.16.2.jar -XX:+UnlockExperimentalVMOptions -XX:+UseG1GC -XX:G1NewSizePercent=20 -XX:G1ReservePercent=20 -XX:MaxGCPauseMillis=50 -XX:G1HeapRegionSize=16M -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -Xmn128m -Xmx3000m -Dfml.ignoreInvalidMinecraftCertificates=true -Dfml.ignorePatchDiscrepancies=true -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Djava.library.path=D:\minecraft原版生存\.minecraft\versions\fabric-loader-0.9.1+build.205-1.16.2\natives -Dminecraft.launcher.brand=HMCL -Dminecraft.launcher.version=3.3.172 -cp replies.author: Wudji
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Wudji 于 2020-8-16 16:26 编辑 

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 103057&pid=19514785
尝试按这里的方法解决
用fabric装这个https://github.com/iczero/fabric ... nj9compat-1.0.0.jar
（也需要fabric api）

replies.author: PercyDan
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 PercyDan 于 2020-8-16 12:11 编辑 

换成jre8

replies.author: 临表涕零
replies.txt_content:
JerryZRF 发表于 2020-8-16 11:35
删除启动器内的jvm额**数
没有自己加参数

replies.txt_content:
